layoutContainer

public void layoutContainer(java.awt.Container parent)
Calculates the layout area within the parent component and takes it insets into account. The drawing area is the complete area without the parents insets and without the space which is needed to draw the labels. Finally #layoutTree(int, int, int, int) is called where the actual tree layout is done.

Specified by:
layoutContainer in interface ViewLayout
Parameters:
parent - container to be layouted
